Electronic Configuration File#

Table of Contents

  • Introduction

  • Electronic State Approximations

    • Bloch States

      • Plane Wave (PW) basis

Introduction#

The electronic configuration file is an HDF5 file containing all the information about the electronic states in the target material.

Warning

Fortran is a column-major language, which affects reading/writing of multi-dimensional datasets with HDF5. For example, for an \(n \times m\) matrix to be read in to Fortran, it must be saved as an \(m \times n\) matrix if the language creating the HDF5 file is row-major (e.g., python).

Electronic State Approximations#

Bloch States#

Plane Wave (PW) basis#

  • config

    • G_list_red - List of \(\mathbf{G}\) vectors the Fourier components of the Bloch wave functions, \(\widetilde{u}_\mathbf{G}\), are computed for.

      • Dim: [\(N_\mathbf{G}\), 3]

  • state_info

    • Zeff_list -
